OUR JUICES

Kiwi Kiss

(kiwi + pineapple + Green Grapes)

This delightful blend features the exotic tang of kiwi, the sweet juiciness of pineapple, and the crisp bite of green grapes. Each sip is a journey to paradise, offering a refreshing escape from the ordinary.

Tropical Twist

(Pineapple + Orange + Ice + Mint )

Dive into a refreshing blend of juicy pineapple, tangy orange, and crisp mint, all served over a bed of ice for the ultimate cool-down experience. This vibrant concoction is like a vacation in a glass.

Kyu Cumber?

( Cucumber, Orange, Lime, Ice)

Beat the heat in style with our invigorating summer cooler ‘Kyu Cumber?’ fusion of cool cucumber, Zingy Orange and lusty lime. Delight in the crispness of cucumber complemented by the citrusy zest, making every sip a rejuvenating experience.

Grape Escape

(Green grapes, Black Grapes, Ice )

Embark on a summer-scape with our signature cooler called the "Grape Escape." So come dive into a refreshing blend of crisp green grapes and luscious black grapes, served over ice to deliver a burst of coolness with every sip. Embark on a journey of grape-infused delight and let this invigorating concoction transport you to a world of pure refreshment.

B-Granade

( Strawberry+ Pomegranate + Ice)

Explode your taste-buds with our scintillating cooler, the "B-granade." Bursting with the explosive flavors of ripe strawberries and tangy pomegranate, served over ice for an extra chill. Dive into a symphony of fruity goodness that will tantalize your taste buds and leave you feeling refreshed and revitalized.

Sunrise Sunset

(Pineapple, Pomegrante, ginger, Ice in two separate layers)

Introducing our dual-layered thirst quencher, the "Sunrise and Sunset" cooler, a harmonious fusion of tropical flavors and refreshing zest. In the Sunrise layer, savor the sweet tang of pineapple, while the Sunset layer awakens your senses with the burst of juicy pomegranate. Each layer is meticulously crafted to perfection with a kick of ginger and served over ice for an extra chill.

Melon Explosion

(Watermelon + strawberry+ Lemon Juice + Mint)

Savor the taste of summer with our "Melon Explosion" cooler, a refreshing blend of sweet watermelon, succulent strawberries, zesty lemon juice, and a hint of cool mint. This invigorating concoction is the perfect antidote to scorching summer days.

Mango Tango

(Mango + Orange + Ice)

Introducing our exclusive"Mango Tango" summer cooler, a tantalizing fusion of ripe mango and zesty orange, served over a refreshing bed of ice. Dive into a symphony of tropical flavors as you sip on this delightful concoction, perfectly crafted to beat the summer heat.
